name: FanHellnovel [Demo - FR]
description: French fan game of Helltaker, it's a visual novel about Lilith. This fan game take place after the game and it's DLC Examtaker. It's a personal project for my studies, i do it alone it's for that i use the original sprites and some fan sprites on internet. I don't know when i will realize the final version but i hope before September. This game will take place in our world during our timeline so, some historical event will be in this game. For the question of a translation to the game, i really don't know, maybe in the future according to my time.
